conbody.p: Test cases are set of steps or user actions that are automated to play out a test case scenario. For more information, refer to
You can view the test cases under current application by navigating to Test development>Test cases from the testsigma dashboard.

fig.p: To learn how to create test case, refer to

conbody.p: From the Test Cases page, you can:

ul.li: Search for a test case by name.
Sort test cases based on various criteria.
Filter test cases to narrow and customize your search for test cases from the test causes list.
Import test cases from an exported list.
Bulk delete one or more test cases.
